column5: I just got a present from my secretary a few minutes ago. My new Knipex 8" spring loaded hook cutters came in from The Ring Lord in Saskatoon. I think it was last Monday or Tuesday that I ordered them in. Not too bad a price at $67.77 with the taxes and postage in. BRING ON THE BIG BAD SKIS!!!
You'll be happy you bought those bigbuck, their about the best you can get.  Kinda nice when you can cut thru 7/0 hooks with one hand.
Knipex are worth the money, every serious Muskie Angler should have a pair!
Yes, they are awesome.  This is where I have purchased for myself and friends.  Particularly useful if you have a buddy in the states to have them sent to.  http://chadstoolbox.com/
